custom_params.label: TWN
custom_params.tooltip: Star twinkle — scintillation and shimmer rate

custom_params.label: DIS
custom_params.tooltip: Apparent distance — how far the star seems

custom_params.label: COL
custom_params.tooltip: Star color — from warm red giants to cool blue stars

custom_params.label: SIZ
custom_params.tooltip: Apparent magnitude — brightness and body of the ping

custom_params.label: ECH
custom_params.tooltip: Cosmic reflection — light echoing through space
